    • Constructor Detail

      • MachineGun

        public MachineGun()
        Instantiates a new Machine Gun card. Sets the field color to BLU calling the constructor of weapon card (the super class). Creates the list of recharge cost settings its value to BLU,RED. Creates the list of effects setting its value to BaseEffect,FocusShotEffect,TurretTripodEffect. Creates the list of focus shot cost(cost of optional effect1) settings it to yellow. Creates the list of turret tripod cost(cost of optional effect2) settings it to blu.
